Package com.example.enigma.Controller

Class CipherController

java.lang.Object
com.example.enigma.Controller.CipherController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEncodable, ITimer
public class CipherController extends Object implements IEncodable, ITimer
The `CipherController` class handles the encryption functionality and manages the cipher page. It allows users to enter text and a cipher key, perform encryption, copy/paste text, and control the virtual keyboard.
Author:
Mojtaba Alizade
See Also:
